body_html: Is there any update on this issue? I think it's especially important for policy gradient reinforcement learning, since the basin of attraction is less stable. I can run the same RL algorithm twice with all other sources of nondeterminism eliminated, and get significantly different results each time. I would like to publish reproducible results, even if the performance hit is significant.

body: Is there any update on this issue? I think it's especially important for policy gradient reinforcement learning, since the basin of attraction is less stable. I can run the same RL algorithm twice with all other sources of nondeterminism eliminated, and get significantly different results each time. I would like to publish reproducible results, even if the performance hit is significant.
